{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = '''''EtherFast''''' ''10/100 Integrated CardBus PC Card'' |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/en-us/support/lbc/PCM200 |dl = |wikidevi = Linksys_PCM200_v1 |wikipedia = |brand = Linksys |model = PCM200 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/06/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_PCM200_v1 |sernum = |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = Type II |vendor_id = 1737 |device_id = ab09 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MQ4C2K5MX |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |ethoui = 00:04:5A |chip1 = ADMtek;AN985 (Centaur-C); |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = tulip |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = AboCom |manuf_model = FE2500MX |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/31/2000 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 745883549450 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00004XRDO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card is presumed to be the v1 model. There is no version info on the card. 1737:ab09 appears to be the PCI ID used. It is found in the driver set for the card (in ''NETPC200.INF''). :Additional PCI IDs in the drivers include... :*1737:ab08 - '''"Linksys EtherFast 10/100 CardBus PC Card Ver II(PCMPC200 vII)"''' ===dmesg dump=== 
[18073.446723] tulip: Linux Tulip driver version 1.1.15 (Feb 27, 2007)
[18073.446789] tulip 0000:07:00.0: enabling device (0000 -> 0003)
[18073.446835] tulip: tulip_init_one: Enabled WOL support for AN983B
[18073.446856] tulip 0000:07:00.0: setting latency timer to 64
[18073.449189] tulip0:  MII transceiver #1 config 3100 status 7849 advertising 05e1
[18073.473547] net eth1: ADMtek Comet rev 17 at Port 0x4000, 00:04:5a:a5:85:11, IRQ 19
